participant_1.background:
My ideal home would have a yard big enough for my dog and cat to run around in.
i used to cheerlead in high school.
i am traveling to barbados next month.
I remember the good times I had as a kid and remind myself that I can still have fun now.
I would love to have lunch with my geocaching friends and share our adventures.

participant_2.background:
I am doing well in school, thank you for asking.
i draw during classes instead of taking notes.
I am an introvert night owl studying radiology in my 20s.
My parents are very supportive of my art, even though they don't understand it.
i am near sighted and wear contact lenses.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you! How are you doing today?
I am doing well too! I am excited because I am going to be traveling to Barbados next month!
Oh wow, that sounds exciting! I have always wanted to travel. I am currently in school studying radiology.
That's awesome! I am sure you will do great in school. What are you enjoying most about radiology?
I am really enjoying learning about the human body and how it works. I also enjoy the hands-on work that we get to do in the lab.
That sounds really interesting! I am sure you will be a great radiologist!
Thank you! I appreciate that! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to geocache! It is a great way to explore new places and meet new people. I also love to spend time with my dog and cat.
Oh wow, I have never heard of geocaching before! That sounds like a really fun activity. I love to draw and I am also a night owl.
That's awesome! I love to draw too! I am usually up late at night working on my art.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I am glad to have met you!
Me too! It was great chatting with you!
